thread.title: Central New York golf: CNY PGA prevails over SDGA in Mitchell Cup
thread.title_full: Central New York golf: CNY PGA prevails over SDGA in Mitchell Cup | syracuse.com

author: M.F. Piraino | Contributing writer
title: Central New York golf: CNY PGA prevails over SDGA in Mitchell Cup
text:
Professionals from the CNY PGA assembled for a team picture Oct. 4 before the Mitchell Cup at Onondaga G&CC. The CNY PGA defeated the SDGA, 27-21. CNY PGA
Central New York PGA professionals defeated golfers from the Syracuse District Golf Association, 27-21, in the 42th annual Mitchell Cup at Onondaga Golf and Country Club on Oct. 4.
In the Morning Modified Alternate Shot, the SDGA and the CNY PGA split their matches and finished tied, 6-6.
The CNY PGA beat the SDGA in the Afternoon Four-Balls matches, 21-15, to clinch the Mitchell Cup. The CNY PGA leads series 27-14-1.
Competing for the CNY PGA were: Mark Tucker, Trey Walewski, Kevin Savage, Rick Bronson, Sean Dadey, Michelle Murphy, Jeff Reader, Bob Fuller, Mel Baum, Rob Phelps, Dennis Colligan and
Eric Manning.
Members of the SDGA squad were: Connor Salanger, Eric Edmunds, Brad Monroe, Tyler McArdell, Brian Evans, Jon Petrin, Chris Schmidt, Bill Moore, Randy Powers, Tom Fletcher, Luke Hobika and Kevin VandenBerg.
42nd Mitchell Cup Results
Morning Modified Alternate Shot Matches (worth two points)
SDGA 6, CNY PGA 6
Connor Salanger – Eric Edmunds (SDGA) def. Russell Schreiber – Trey Walewski (CNY PGA), 2-0; Tyler McArdell - Brad Monroe (SDGA) halved Rick Bronson – Kevin Savage (CNY PGA), 1-1; Sean Dadey – Michelle Murphy (CNY PGA) def. Bryan Evans – John Petrin (SDGA), 2-0; Chris Schmidt - Bill Moore (SDGA) def. Jeff Reader – Bob Fuller (CNY PGA), 2-0; Mel Baum – Rob Phelps (CNY PGA) halved. Randy Powers – Tom Fletcher (SDGA), 1-1; Dennis Colligan – Eric Manning (CNY PGA) def. Luke Hobika – Kevin VandenBerg (SDGA), 2-0.
Afternoon Four-ball Matches (worth six points)
CNY PGA 21, SDGA 15
Kevin Savage – Mel Baum (CNY PGA) def. Chris Schmidt - Bill Moore (SDGA), 6-0; Luke Hobika – Kevin VandenBerg (SDGA) def. Rick Bronson – Bob Fuller (CNY PGA), 6-0; Dennis Colligan – Eric Manning (CNY PGA) halved Connor Salanger – Eric Edmunds (SDGA), 3-3; Sean Dadey – Michelle Murphy (CNY PGA) halved Tyler McArdell - Brad Monroe (SDGA), 3-3; Mark Tucker – Rob Phelps (CNY PGA) def. Randy Powers – Tom Fletcher (SDGA) 4-2; Trey Walewski – Jeff Reader (CNY PGA) def. Bryan Evans – John Petrin (SDGA), 5-1
